name: S**t Designer Put The Buttons Together
name_original: S**t Designer Put The Buttons Together
description:
Long long ago, a evil dragon lived in mysterious castle, who made the world fell into chaos. And now, a young Knight and Princess are going to crusade the dragon... A world of extreme mess awaits them.

    Please Use Your Mouse To Play This Game.

    Some levels may be extremely difficult, but you can skip three of them at most by holding Escape to select levels.

    You can Press Alt + Enter to switch to Full Screen for better experience.
